formData.title: Senior Frontend Developer Mad Libs Challenge

inputs.title: Which of these remind you of the worst food you've ever eaten?
inputs.name: worstFood

inputs.title: I hear Markham plays a lot of golf. What do you think his handicap is?
inputs.name: handicapIndex
inputs.label: This is a number as high as 54. Most golfers lie so it's usually best to add 10 to your best guess.

inputs.title: How many hours a week do you think you spend online?
inputs.name: timeOnline
inputs.label: Be honest...

inputs.title: What is the most times you have ever cursed at the TV while watching your favorite team?
inputs.name: swear
inputs.label: We all do it...at least those of us on planet earth.

inputs.title: How much do you enjoy working for Barstool Sports?
inputs.name: loveJob
options: I work so hard! I'm ready for that promotion
I'm ready for my Barstool tattoo

inputs.title: How many pounds do you think the Stanley Cup weighs?
inputs.name: trophyWeight
inputs.label: If you know this I'll be very impressed

inputs.title: What do you think is the scariest animal in the world?
inputs.name: scaryAnimal

inputs.title: What is the most slices of pizza you've had in one sitting?
inputs.name: slicesPizza

inputs.title: How many miles is the farthest you've driven without stopping?
inputs.name: longestDrive
